name: FaithStreamNetwork
0:
”Alexa, open faith stream network”
”Alexa, ask faith stream network for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start faith stream network”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: faith stream network
des: Listen to the latest Faith Stream Network programming from BBS Radio TV. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
